Module com.lask
Package com.lask.controller

Class TaskVisualizationController

java.lang.Object
com.lask.controller.TaskVisualizationController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class TaskVisualizationController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The controller of the editing and visualization of tasks. Manage the task list for new file and opened files
